link_desc:
Based on numerous APC's templates (tnx folks!) and lots of digging in PowerNet-MIB. General items and triggers.

Created by request from local UPS admin (man u r so-oo lazzy for zabbix!).

Update:

For reason unclear to me both our UPSs starts to report -1 as Device temperature. They were relocated to another room or dat' bozo-admin do something wierd againg. Anyway this was out of the blue.

Values used were - PowerNet-MIB::iemStatusProbeCurrentTemp / .1.3.6.1.4.1.318.1.1.10.2.3.2.1.4.1

I located another values - PowerNet-MIB::uioSensorStatusTemperatureDegC.2.1 / .1.3.6.1.4.1.318.1.1.25.1.2.1.6.2.1 and used them.

Maybe this would be useful if someone face a similar situation

I'd upload second variant as v2.4 file (checked, works)
